definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[שׁפה]] (cf. Ar. 0’u3fiy=ah;un stone (one of three) supporting kettle, Aram.tpayo0 tripod, also [[תַּפְיׇא]] fire-jar; hence perhaps as denom. Heb. [[[שָׁפַת]]] q. v., Fra:53; cf. 3fy II., Aram. tp0, [[תְּפִי]] set on a kettle or pot; v. also GFM: Ju Jdg 5:16 RS:Sem. i. 357, 2nd ed. 377).
